sourcesContent: import r from"react";import{OverlayContainer as e}from"@react-aria/overlays";import{__DEV__ as o}from"../utils/assertion";import{usePopover as t}from"./use-popover";import{PopoverProvider as i}from"./popover-context";import{jsx as a}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as m}from"react/jsx-runtime";const p=r.forwardRef(((o,p)=>{const{children:s,...n}=o,f=t({ref:p,...n}),[c,l]=r.Children.toArray(s),x=f.state.isOpen||!f.exited;return m(i,{value:f,children:[c,x&&a(e,{children:l})]})}));o&&(p.displayName="NextUI.Popover"),p.toString=()=>".nextui-popover";export default p;
